message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $10,000 is simply too low for me. How about we split the difference? I'm willing to come down to $10,750. This would still give you a great deal considering the value of the product to you.
I appreciate the effort, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I really need to stay within my budget.
